Package sailpoint.web

Class UtilBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.web.PageCodeBase
      • sailpoint.web.BaseBean
        • sailpoint.web.UtilBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.faces.component.StateHolder, sailpoint.web.UserContext
    public class UtilBean
extends sailpoint.web.BaseBean
    A request scoped bean providing several commonly used properties, primarily for populating selection menus.

      • getApplications

        public java.util.List<javax.faces.model.SelectItem> getApplications()
                                                             throws GeneralException
        Return the available applications. Note that we only use names since they will be unique and it makes it easier to use this in places that want just the name.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • getPopulations

        public java.util.List<javax.faces.model.SelectItem> getPopulations()
                                                            throws GeneralException
        Returns:
        group definitions that were not created by factories. This list could be large so in practice we need to be using a suggest component.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • getWorkflows

        public java.util.List<javax.faces.model.SelectItem> getWorkflows()
                                                          throws GeneralException
        Build a select list of workflows. We do not currently have a way of typing workflows so just return all of them.
        Returns:
        a list of all workflows
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • getRulesJSON

        public java.lang.String getRulesJSON()
                              throws GeneralException
        Takes a Request Parameter of Rule Type ("type") and Include Prompt ("prompt") Type represents the type of rules to return Prompt represents whether we add a default entry in the results for message key select_rule. This entry will not have a value associated with it. Simply a place-holder for no selection made.
        Returns:
        JSON representation of the rules requested based on request params submitted
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • getSubprocessesJson

        public java.lang.String getSubprocessesJson()
                                     throws GeneralException
        Takes an optional Request Parameter of Workflow Type ("type") and Include Prompt ("prompt") Type represents the type of workflows to return Prompt represents whether we add a default entry in the results for Message Key select_subprocess. This entry will not have a value associated with it. Simply a place-holder for no selection made.
        Returns:
        JSON representation of workflows requested based on the request parameters submitted.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • getEmailTemplates

        public java.util.List<javax.faces.model.SelectItem> getEmailTemplates()
        Returns:
        EmailTemplates ordered by name.

        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • getCustomCMCSSExists

        public boolean getCustomCMCSSExists()
        Check to see if a custom.css exists for CodeMirror.
        Returns:
        true if a custom.css exists for CodeMirror, false if not
